function.name: message_notify_user
function.description: Send a message to the user via the NodePilot frontend. Use for providing updates, results, or general information.

text.description: Message text to display to user

function.name: message_ask_user
function.description: Ask the user a question via the NodePilot frontend and wait for a response. Use for clarifying requirements or gathering additional input.

text.description: Question text to present to user

function.name: n8n_workflow_validator
function.description: Validate an n8n workflow JSON structure. Returns true if valid, false otherwise, along with any error messages.

workflow_json.description: The n8n workflow JSON string to validate.

function.name: n8n_documentation_lookup
function.description: Search or retrieve specific information from the n8n documentation or knowledge base. Useful for looking up node parameters, examples, or best practices.

query.description: The specific query or topic to search for in the n8n documentation.
